titles.title: 340B PATIENTS Act of 2025
340B PATIENTS Act of 2025
340B Pharmaceutical Access To Invest in Essential, Needed Treatments & Support Act of 2025
A bill to ensure accessibility of drugs furnished through the drug discount program under section 340B of the Public Health Service Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
